column1: Smoque BBQ////Think about what barbecue ribs are.  You take a rather low quality cut of meat
column2: season the heck out of it
column3: and cook it at low temperatures for long enough to make it edible.  It's real easy to get any of those steps wrong and have it turn out really poorly.  It's really very difficult to get right every single time.  Smoque absolutely nails this
column4: and has come up with an extremely well balanced rub and sauce to go with it.  Mad props.
